name: reverso-to-anki-fr
description: Look up FR-EN constructions in Reverso Context via command line and set how many examples you would like to see. Then you choose either to export the Anki-friendly examples in a txt file (which can be later on imported in Anki, yay, sweetness) or just have a look at the examples without saving them whatsoever. Afterwards, the examples are displayed.
author: Ilya Horatio
